snippet.title: The Lord of the Rings™: Gollum™ | Sneak Peek Trailer
snippet.description:
“It mustn't see us! Help… don’t look at us… The precious is calling!”

Get a sneak peek at the upcoming story-driven action adventure video game based on the world of J. R. R. Tolkien.

The Lord of the Rings™: Gollum™ will be available in 2022 on Xbox and PlayStation consoles, Nintendo Switch™ and PC.

©2021 Daedalic Entertainment and Nacon. ©2021 Co-published by Daedalic Entertainment and Nacon, and developed by Daedalic Entertainment. All rights reserved.

©2021 Middle-earth Enterprises. All rights reserved. 

“Gollum”, “Middle-earth” and “The Lord of the Rings” and the names of the characters, events, items and places therein are trademarks or registered trademarks of The Saul Zaentz Company d/b/a Middle-earth Enterprises under license to Daedalic Entertainment GmbH.  
-------------------------------
